content.1: Ephraim feedeth on wind, and followeth after the east wind: he daily increaseth lies and desolation; and they do make a covenant with the Assyrians, and oil is carried into Egypt.
content.3: He took his brother by the heel in the womb, and by his strength he had power with God:
content.4: Yea, he had power over the angel, and prevailed: he wept, and made supplication unto him: he found him
content.6: Therefore turn thou to thy God: keep mercy and judgment, and wait on thy God continually.
content.8: And Ephraim said, Yet I am become rich, I have found me out substance:
content.10: I have also spoken by the prophets, and I have multiplied visions, and used similitudes, by the ministry of the prophets.
content.12: And Jacob fled into the country of Syria, and Israel served for a wife, and for a wife he kept
